document.full_text: the international olympic committee (ioc) kicked off the bid process for the 2020 summer olympics monday with the winning city to be announced in 2013.
document.title: ioc launches bid process for 2020 summer games
lines_and_colors: the international olympic committee (ioc) kicked off the bid process for the 2020 summer olympics monday with the winning city to be announced in 2013.
